item.title: Setting goals for 2020
item.description: Over the past couple of years i've realised the power of speaking something into existence. This has mainly manifested itself in sporting goals but I think it's applicable to all areas of life. The accountability that you gain from putting your goals and ambitions out there for the world to see, really can't be understated. So here are my goals for 2020! Tech Goals Release Subtle Sports open-source..This is a project that I started over the summer when the Cricket World Cup was on.

item.title: About
item.description: Cornwall, 2018 Hi, my name is Chris Whiteley and this is my personal blog, or to be more accurate a collection of ramblings on unconnected topics with the aim to provide some small sliver of value to someone, somewhere. I currently work as a software developer for a financial services firm in London. Some technologies i've been working with recently are: Kubernetes / Docker Microsoft SQL Server C# .
